item_times=item_times+1,
recall_time=#{recall_time},
business_ma_name=#{business_ma_name},
where 1=1 and item_id=#{item_id}

update companys
company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_open_address = #{companyOpenAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_corporation = #{companyCorporation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_corporation_phone = #{companyCorporationPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_corporation_idcard = #{companyCorporationIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_organization_code = #{companyOrganizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_banknumber = #{companyBanknumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_bank = #{companyBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_editime = #{companyEditime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
company_edit_member = #{companyEditMember,jdbcType=BIGINT},
company_open_endtime = #{companyOpenEndtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
company_employ_count = #{companyEmployCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
company_salary_divide = #{companySalaryDivide,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
company_isupload = #{companyIsupload,jdbcType=INTEGER},
company_recharge_channel = #{companyRechargeChannel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
company_deposit_bankAccountName = #{companyDepositBankAccountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_deposit_bankNo = #{companyDepositBankNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_bankaddress = #{companyBankaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_enter_require = #{companyEnterRequire,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_is_view_require = #{companyIsViewRequire,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into company_activity ( activity_name, activity_member_id, activity_company_id, activity_has_receive, activity_create_time, activity_receive, activity_number, activity_order_number, activity_ip, receive_account) values (#{activityName}, #{activityMemberId}, #{activityCompanyId}, #{activityHasReceive}, #{activityCreateTime}, #{activityReceive}, #{activityNumber}, #{activityOrderNumber}, #{activityIp}, #{receiveAccount} )
mapper.update: update company_activity set wechat_return_msg=#{wechatReturnMsg} where activity_id =#{activityId}
update companys set company_truename=#{companyTruename},company_alipay_number=#{companyAlipayNumber}, company_is_collect_info =#{companyIsCollectInfo} where company_id=#{companyId}
